articles.title: Flu drug once blamed for seizures in kids gets a surprising reversal
articles.description: A long-running debate over Tamiflu’s safety in children may finally be settled. Researchers found that influenza, not the antiviral medication, was linked to serious neuropsychiatric events like seizures and hallucinations.
